evidence.claim: HCA HealthONE uses AWS cloud services for scalability and security in patient data management.
The company integrates with EHRs using FHIR standards for interoperability.
HIPAA compliance is emphasized in their developer documentation and API design.
HCA HealthONE utilizes HL7 protocols for real-time patient data exchange.
They participate in health information exchanges (HIE) using X12 transaction sets for claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in X12 transactions and values API automation for healthcare data exchange.
